alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:12AM CDT until June 14 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR FRANKLIN AND NORTHEASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 511 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fern, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Mountainburg... Mulberry... Altus... Denning... Chester... Wiederkehr Village... Cass... Lake Fort Smith... Fern... Jethro... Bidville... Locke... Turners Bend... Mount Gayler... Cecil... Lonelm... Etna... Alix... Barnes... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 22 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 31 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
